description:
wood very striped, honey and red brown; very ornate floral and foliage silver inlay on stock; wooden patch box with silver inlay; "Liberty and Property" engraved in butt plate, "Judson and Brennan No 45" engraved on metal above forearm, "T Brennan" engraved on trigger plate; small ivory or bone handled pick in holder on stock, PL side. 
Arms and Armor-Firearm
medium: Curly stump maple, iron, steel, silver, gold
title: American-style Flintlock Longrifle
